body_html:
I have the same issue with tf.one_hot() . Here is my settings:

  • Windows 10
  • NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Cuda 8.0
  • CuDnn 5.1
  • TensorFlow 0.12

Error: Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_ILLEGAL_ADDRESS
Kernel died

body:
I have the same issue with `tf.one_hot()` . Here is my settings:

- Windows 10
- NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
- Cuda 8.0
- CuDnn 5.1
- TensorFlow 0.12

Error:    `Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_ILLEGAL_ADDRESS`
             `Kernel died`
